clinical_history: Patient with chronic dyspnea and smoking history.
findings: Focal consolidation in left upper lobe with air bronchogram.
Well-defined nodule measuring 20 mm in left upper lobe.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left upper lobe.
Bronchiectatic changes in left upper lobe region.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left upper lobe.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
recommendations: Immediate intervention may be required depending on severity.
